title: Discussion on new HUD.
body:
Tbh i don't really like the new HUD I would prefer the old one better.
R.I.P Old hud (Unless Rito brings it back to life)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Major Armstrong,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eEVEAo7x,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-28T07:58:32.274+0000)
>
> New one looks fine imo.

The looks are ok, apart from those weird coloured buttons and a big headed space used for the summoner. Xp bars not so clear, our stats take up more room that they used to, and the scoreboard could be bigger when we press tab.

New hud is complete crap, but i don't expect Riot to change it, they'll make small tweaks to it but it'll still stay the way it is right now, they should really give us an option to move the hud around where we like it, the items and champ icons being on the right looks so bad.

> [{quoted}](name=Unseen Predator,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eEVEAo7x,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-28T09:25:43.768+0000)
>
> New hud is complete crap, but i don't expect Riot to change it, they'll make small tweaks to it but it'll still stay the way it is right now, they should really give us an option to move the hud around where we like it, the items and champ icons being on the right looks so bad.

I completely agree with you.

I dislike the new hud. I have to put it to as small as it will go to even play with it but by this time i cant see a thing on it. I want a way to change back to the old hud 1 that didnt annoy and information was easy to see
please give me back the possibility to use alert pings on minimap by using right click mousebutton on minimap
Ping and FPS monitors are garbage and the score board is wwaaayyy to small..
